channel.title: Archives on 🛡️ Dragon Shell
channel.description: Recent content in Archives on 🛡️ Dragon Shell

item.title: Archives Page
item.description:
You will need to create content/archives/_index.md to enable the archives page.

---
title: "Archives"
description: "..."
draft: false
icon: archive-box
cover:
 image: cover.jpg
---

Or, if your file are not at content/archives/, you can add layout: archives in your markdown’s frontmatter.

---
title: "Archives"
description: "..."
draft: false
icon: archive-box
cover:
 image: cover.jpg
layout: archives
---
